core.name: Fractional CTO
core.oneLiner: Align tech with KPIs; ship decisions, not decks.
outcomes: Define a 90-day roadmap tied to revenue, cost, or reliability KPIs
Stand up the right rituals (PRDs, ADRs, design reviews) to raise velocity
Unblock hiring and vendor choices with clear, auditable criteria

core.name: AI Product Strategy
core.oneLiner: From prompt to production with evals & guardrails.
outcomes: Use-case scoring and cost/latency budgets
Evaluation harness (accuracy, bias, hallucination, drift)
Human-in-the-loop, red-team tests, rollback playbook

core.name: Platform Architecture
core.oneLiner: Design modular services with clear SLAs and cost/perf budgets.
outcomes: Domain boundaries that map to teams and roadmaps
Observability-first services with golden signals and SLOs
Secure-by-default interfaces and data contracts

core.name: Cloud & DevOps
core.oneLiner: Zero-downtime moves, IaC, and pragmatic reliability.
outcomes: Blue/green or canary releases with automated rollbacks
Terraform/IaC baselines; cost guardrails and alerts
Incident response playbooks and postmortems

core.name: Compliance & VAPT
core.oneLiner: Close gaps fast—prove it with evidence packs.
outcomes: Map controls (ISO/GDPR) → implement → collect evidence
Threat modeling and VAPT remediation backlogs
Data privacy by design (DPIA, retention, consent)

core.name: Team Coaching
core.oneLiner: Rituals, standards, and feedback loops that raise velocity.
outcomes: Pair reviews and design clinics; fewer reworks
Definition of Ready/Done that sticks
Career ladders and growth paths that retain talent

core.name: Web & Mobile App Development
core.oneLiner: Cross-platform apps that scale from MVP to enterprise.
outcomes: Responsive web apps with modern frameworks (React, Vue, Angular)
Native and cross-platform mobile apps (React Native, Flutter)
Progressive Web Apps (PWA) for seamless user experience
API-first architecture with robust backend services
